name: GDKO - Round 1 - Slime Character
description:
This is a 2022 Character made for GDKO Round 1.

You control a Slime focused on Soft body physics, this kind of character would work in a puzzle or platformer game.

Character details and controls:

- Movement: You can left or right using the arrow keys or "A" & "S"

- Jump: Press spacebar to jump one or twice

- Dash: Press "F" to dash a small distance on the direction you are moving

- Walls: You can wall slide and jump from them

- Change size: You can become bigger or smaller by pressing "Num 1" or "Num 2"
